thread.title: Trump: Angry Crowds at Many GOP Town Halls ‘Planned Out by Liberal Activists’
thread.title_full: Trump: Angry Crowds at Many GOP Town Halls ‘Planned Out by Liberal Activists’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump: Angry Crowds at Many GOP Town Halls ‘Planned Out by Liberal Activists’
text:
Trump: Angry Crowds at Many GOP Town Halls ‘Planned Out by Liberal Activists’ by Josh Feldman | 6:31   
Some Republican members of Congress have faced angry crowds at their town halls recently, and President Trump weighed in today on Twitter by saying it’s not quite so organic: The so-called angry crowds in home districts of some Republicans are actually, in numerous cases, planned out by liberal activists. Sad! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 21, 2017 
And given the attention given to the president’s television viewing habits, it should be noted that minutes before Trump sent out this tweet, Fox News’ Peter Doocy was saying on the air that “some of the chaos from GOP town hall meetings is very well-choreographed by the liberal activists that helped get Barack Obama elected president.” 
[ image via Shutterstock ]
